display_long_description:
# Aliens exist — and they love… **Disc Golf?**

**Disc Frenzy** brings the fun of Disc Golf straight to you!


- **8 handcrafted courses (1 playable in the demo)**, 100+ holes – from seaside sand traps to floating islands - each course offers unique challenges.
[media]

- **Flexible modes** – Play solo, open a friends-only lobby, or host a public match. Online supports Stroke and Match Play scoring, voice chat, and crossplay.
[media]

- **True-to-life flight** – every disc uses fully simulated Speed, Glide, Turn & Fade values, as well as weight and size that you can tweak for custom molds. Seasoned disc-golfers will feel right at home, while our pick-up-and-play tutorial welcomes new players
[media]

- **150+ unlockables (33 in the demo)** – earn new patterns and stamps by shooting par or better, or scan each world with the belt radar to discover hidden discs.
[media]

- **Movement your way** – smooth or snap turn, teleport, or walk; plus free-climb any surface for rescue shots and creative lines.
[media]

- **Language support** – English, French, Spanish, Danish, German, Italian.


Grab your headset, build your perfect bag, and master the first course in this demo version — **will you be Udarvia’s next disc-golf champion**?

# Aliens exist — and they love… **Disc Golf?**

**Disc Frenzy** brings the fun of Disc Golf straight to you!


- **8 handcrafted courses (1 playable in the demo)**, 100+ holes – from seaside sand traps to floating islands - each course offers unique challenges.

- **Language support** – English, French, Spanish, Danish, German, Italian.


Grab your headset, build your perfect bag, and master the first course in this demo version — **will you be Udarvia’s next disc-golf champion**?
